pages.text: Souls are important crafting materials for some powerful items in the world of Terramity.$(br2)
Spiteful souls can be obtained by slaying villagers. Alternatively, they drop from Hellroks.
Lost souls can be found in mausoleums, drops from Duskroks, and drops from the mobs you'll find within a Trial Spire.
Accursed souls can be obtained by breaking a mob spawner of any kind.
A warden soul is simply obtained by defeating a warden. Good luck!
